title: The Fiend
content:
1 Slot

BG3 Warlock Features Progression

Level 1 - Subclass (The Fiend, The Great Old One, The Archfey) Level 2 - Pick 2 Eldritch Invocations (Class Features) Level 3 - Pick 1 of the 3 Pact Boon available. Pact of the Chain, Pact of the Blade, and Pact of the Tome. Level 4 - Feat - Choose one from the Feats list Level 5 - Deepened Pact (Class Features) Level 5 - Pick 1 Eldritch Invocations (Class Features) Level 7 - Pick 1 Eldritch Invocations (Class Features) Level 8 - Feat - Choose one from
